articles.description: Kate Shortman and Izzy Thorpe win Great Britain's first ever Olympic medal in artistic swimming with silver in the duet.
articles.title: Olympics artistic swimming: Kate Shortman & Izzy Thorpe take historic silver

articles.description: Great Britain's Georgia Bell clinches a sensational women's 1500m bronze on her Olympic debut at Paris 2024.
articles.title: Paris 2024 Olympics: GB's Georgia Bell clinches sensational 1500m bronze

articles.description: Your day-by-day guide to what is happening when - and who to watch out for - at the Paris 2024 Olympics.
articles.title: Olympics schedule & day-by-day guide to key events & British medal hopes at Paris 2024

articles.description: Find out the medal table from the Paris Olympics 2024, including overall medals, gold medals, silver medals and bronze medals for Team GB and other countries.
articles.title: Olympic Medal Table - Paris 2024 gold, silver & bronze tally

articles.description: The United States maintain their grip on the Olympic men's basketball title as Steph Curry and LeBron James inspire them to a fifth successive gold medal.
articles.title: Olympics basketball: LeBron James, Steph Curry and NBA superstars win gold for United States

articles.description: Emma Hayes says winning Olympic football gold with the United States is "the greatest moment" of her managerial career.
articles.title: Emma Hayes: Olympics football gold with USA 'greatest moment' of career for former Chelsea manager

articles.description: Lin Yu-ting becomes the second boxer in 24 hours to win Olympic gold, despite the ongoing row over her gender eligibility.
articles.title: Olympic boxing: Lin Yu-ting wins gold amid gender eligibility row

articles.description: The performances from Manchester City's youngsters in their Community Shield win show they may be able to cover a potential exit of World Cup winner Julian Alvarez.
articles.title: Manchester City: Can Community Shield young stars solve Julian Alvarez exit puzzle for Pep Guardiola

articles.description: Brazil's all-time leading goalscorer Marta said she has likely played her last game for her country.
articles.title: Marta: Legendary forward 'probably' won't play for Brazil again

articles.description: Britain's Noah Williams pulls off a stunning final-round dive to take bronze in the men's 10m platform to win a second medal of the Paris Olympics.
articles.title: Olympics diving: Noah Williams takes bronze in 10m platform
